org.jogger
Class Environment

java.lang.Object
  org.jogger.Environment

public final class Environment
extends Object

Helper class that provides methods to check the environment in which Jogger is running. Remember that the environment is set using a system (i.e. System.setProperty method) or environment (i.e. System.setenv method) variable.

Author:
German Escobar

          Retrieves the environment in which Jogger is working.

Method Detail

get

public static String get()
Retrieves the environment in which Jogger is working.

Returns:

isTesting

Checks if Jogger is working in testing mode.

Returns:
true if working in testing mode, false otherwise.

Checks if Jogger is working in development mode.

Returns:

Returns:
